author: SciShow
description:
Something about digging a hole makes it one of the most satisfying and universal human experiences. We all did it as a kid, but some of us never stopped digging! Let's explore some of the ways scientists and engineers have used digging to learn about our planet, ancient civilizations, or just to get stuff out of the ground.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)
